author: smuzaffar
body: Remove PY3 checks for unit tests. This was needed as boost_python was build with python2 while in PY3 IBs the default python was python3. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/5903 should now build boost python with python3 in PY3 IBs, so there is no need to have these speical conditions in BuildFile.xml
title: remove PY3 check as boost now build with python3
